metadata.title: About us | Petpooja
metadata.description: The best restaurant POS software to manage your restaurant billing, KOTs, inventory, online order, menu, and customers.

h1: Hey! We’re Petpooja and we help restaurant
h2: Serving those who serve delicious food
h3: Join us and shape the future of restaurant industry

structure.main_content: Get in touch with our team to clarify your queries Hey! We’re Petpooja and we help restaurant We deliver products that ensure revenue growth and the best customer experience for all types of restaurant partners From a small-scale B2B food delivery platform to India’s no. 1 restaurant billing software provider When Petpooja’s first avatar came into being in 2011, it was a simple B2B food delivery model that took bulk food orders from the corporates & passed them forward to the restaurants. But soon, our founders realised that the restaurants they worked with were not living up to their potential and were shutting down forever. Primarily it was due to a lack of coherent technology that could support their daily operations. Their billing machines were as bulky, tedious and old as time. Due to this, the restaurants never had an actual estimate of their profit margins & expenses. Back then, restaurants were suffering more than growing. This was when our founders decided to build a robust, user-friendly & cost-effective billing software for SMB restaurants that will automate everyday operations and push businesses towards sustainability. And now, a decade into the industry, we have realized our dream of becoming the ideal restaurant billing solution provider to all & every kind of food service business in India. Empowering restaurant ecosystem Streamline unorganized sector of the food industry Innovation The major force behind our success has always been constant research & innovation. Simplicity We believe in creating solutions that come without any confusing instruction manuals Customer support We always ensure that our restaurant partners are heard & their problems resolved Pricing We are a strong believer in transparent & cost-effective pricing of technology Serving those who serve delicious food We learn, adapt & improve our technology to suit the needs of all our modern users 75,000+ Clients across India, UAE, South Africa & expanding further 140+ Cities covered by our on ground support team 25% Online order volume on zomato & swiggy processed on Petpooja 60L Bills processed everyday hassle & error free People behind Petpooja Meet the masterminds that pulled all-nighters to make the dream happen Parthiv Patel Co-founder & CEO Apurv Patel Co-founder & CSO A growing team of 1300+ employees Support from 75,000+ restaurants Join us and shape the future of restaurant industry Schedule a free demo Get in touch with our team to clarify your queries POS Add-ons Outlet types Resources Prayosha Food Services Private Limited COPYRIGHT © 2024 - Prayosha Food Services Pvt.
